name: Pareicopse
description:
Surviving the night in the woods should be easy, as long as you don't wander too far away from camp...

Pareicopse is a survival horror experience where you're tasked with finding your camping buddy who has been gone a little too long. Navigate the woods, and stay hidden from things bumping in the night. This game was made for the Haunted PS1 game jam in a little over a month, and released for Halloween.

Tips

  • If you are lost, try searching around with the Dowsing Rod Equipped.
  • The Toilet Paper will make noise if thrown into a bush.
  • You'll get scared of the dark easily, but be sure to manage how long you use your Lantern.
  • If you run out of oil in your Lantern, keep exploring and you may be rewarded.
  • If you aren't sure what button takes you back in menus, its usually ESC.
